attributes.action: Sale of V5c and chassis plates to be made illegal
attributes.additional_details:
V5 and chassis plates sold without the vehicle to be illegal to help prevent the sale of 'vehicle ringing' kits.

Whilst it is an offence not to inform DVLA of any vehicle changes currently it appears not an offence to sale just the identity.

The V5 to be the property of HM Gov and illegal to sell.
